X.i.6.I.2.d
.  When a Proposed Rating Decision Is Not Binding
VA is
not
bound by the decisions set forth in an IDES participant’s proposed rating decision if
the service department returns the individual to duty (based on disenrollment or an MEB or PEB determination), and
the participant subsequently files a claim for VA benefits, to include a Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) or other pre-discharge claim.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Processing Based on Service Department Outcomes
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I
